original_text: The Lord says, ‘You Israelite people, do not think that you are more important to me than the people of Ethiopia. It is true that I led you safely out of Egypt. But I also brought the Philistines from Crete. And I brought the Aramean people from Kir. The Lord says, ‘You Israelite people, do not think that you are more important to me than the people of Ethiopia. It is true that I led you safely out of Egypt. But I also brought the Philistines from Crete. And I brought the Aramean people from Kir.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 이스라엘 자손들아 너희는 내게 구스 족속 같지 아니하냐 내가 이스라엘을 애굽 땅에서, 블레셋 사람을 갑돌에서, 아람 사람을 기르에서 올라오게 하지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: do not think that you are more important to me
sentences.korean_translation: 내게 구스 사람보다 나중이라고 생각하지 말라

sentences.original_text: It is true that I led you safely out of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이스라엘을 애굽 땅에서 올라오게 하였음은 참으로 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: But I also brought the Philistines from Crete
sentences.korean_translation: 또 블레셋 사람을 갑돌에서 인도하여 내었으며

sentences.original_text: And I brought the Aramean people from Kir
